Package com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.protocol_mapper.zombie_session

Interface IExagonZombieSessionManagement

public interface IExagonZombieSessionManagement

    Method
    Description

    createAdministrativeCloseSessionEvent(String sessionId)

    getMaxExpectedDelta(String sessionId)

  • Method Details

    • createAdministrativeCloseSessionEvent

      List<IExagonInternalRequest> createAdministrativeCloseSessionEvent(String sessionId)
      Generates an administrative session termination pseudo-event to terminate a session. This method is called internally by Exagon and used on its Zombie Session Manager (ZSM).
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the identifier of the session that should be administratively terminated
      Returns:
      the pseudo-events to terminate the session
      Since:
      5.0

    • getMaxExpectedDelta

      MaxExpectedDelta getMaxExpectedDelta(String sessionId)
      Calculates the maximum expected horizon in which there must be a new stimulus (request) from the network for a given session. If this horizon is surpassed without any network stimulus, Exagon considers the session expired and forces its termination with an administrative session termination pseudo-event. This method is called internally by Exagon and used on its Zombie Session Manager (ZSM).
      Returns:
      a record containing the max expected horizon (delta) and the session identifier
